Line 104: Line 104:
There are tools available to help people make the decision, such as several different versions of the Linux Distribution Chooser<ref>[http://www.zegeniestudios.net/ldc/ zegenie Studios Linux Distribution Chooser<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref><ref>[http://www.tuxs.org/chooser/ (:^tuxs.org) Linux Distribution Chooser<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref><ref>[http://desktoplinuxathome.com/distro.html Desktop Linux At Home - Distro Selector<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> and the universal package search tool, whohas.<ref>[http://www.philippwesche.org/2004/programs/whohas/intro.html Philipp's Homepage: whohas<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> There are some easy ways to try out several Linux distributions before deciding on one. [[Multi Distro]] is a [[Live CD]] that contains nine space-saving distributions.<ref>[http://www.linux.com/article.pl?sid=06/05/22/1353239 Linux.com :: Multi Distro is Linux times 9 on a single CD-R<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> Tools are available to make such CDs and DVDs, among them Nautopia.<ref>[http://applications.linux.com/article.pl?sid=06/03/16/1724219&tid=47 Linux.com :: Multiple live CDs in one DVD<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
There are tools available to help people make the decision, such as several different versions of the Linux Distribution Chooser<ref>[http://www.zegeniestudios.net/ldc/ zegenie Studios Linux Distribution Chooser<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref><ref>[http://www.tuxs.org/chooser/ (:^tuxs.org) Linux Distribution Chooser<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref><ref>[http://desktoplinuxathome.com/distro.html Desktop Linux At Home - Distro Selector<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> and the universal package search tool, whohas.<ref>[http://www.philippwesche.org/2004/programs/whohas/intro.html Philipp's Homepage: whohas<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> There are some easy ways to try out several Linux distributions before deciding on one. [[Multi Distro]] is a [[Live CD]] that contains nine space-saving distributions.<ref>[http://www.linux.com/article.pl?sid=06/05/22/1353239 Linux.com :: Multi Distro is Linux times 9 on a single CD-R<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> Tools are available to make such CDs and DVDs, among them Nautopia.<ref>[http://applications.linux.com/article.pl?sid=06/03/16/1724219&tid=47 Linux.com :: Multiple live CDs in one DVD<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
â
Virtual machines such as [[VirtualBox]], [[VMware Workstation]], and [[Microsoft Virtual PC]] permit booting of Live CD image files without actually burning a CD.
+
[[Virtual machine]]s such as [[VirtualBox]], [[VMware Workstation]], and [[Microsoft Virtual PC]] permit booting of Live CD image files without actually burning a CD.
Details and interest rankings of Linux distributions are available on [[DistroWatch]] and a fairly comprehensive list of Live CDs is [http://www.livecdlist.com/ The Live CD List]. Some websites such as [http://shots.osdir.com/ OSDir.com] and [http://www.osvids.com/ OSVids.com] offer screenshots and videos as a means to getting a first impression of various distributions.
Details and interest rankings of Linux distributions are available on [[DistroWatch]] and a fairly comprehensive list of Live CDs is [http://www.livecdlist.com/ The Live CD List]. Some websites such as [http://shots.osdir.com/ OSDir.com] and [http://www.osvids.com/ OSVids.com] offer screenshots and videos as a means to getting a first impression of various distributions.
